objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#3C4B38;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#51634D;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accent-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#C7E025;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#9BC01C;stop-opacity:0.3'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg-gradient)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='rgba(255,255,255,0.2)' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='rgba(255,255,255,0.1)' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='rgba(0,0,0,0.05)'/><path d='M300,150 C450,50 650,150 800,80' stroke='url(#accent-gradient)' stroke-width='40' opacity='0.2' fill='none'/><path d='M250,950 C400,850 600,950 850,880' stroke='url(#accent-gradient)' stroke-width='40' opacity='0.2' fill='none'/><circle cx='840' cy='240' r='120' fill='url(#accent-gradient)' opacity='0.15'/><circle cx='240' cy='840' r='150' fill='url(#accent-gradient)' opacity='0.15'/></svg>

objects.text:
Energy Score & Wellness Tips
Improved Heart Rate Tracking
Sleep Monitoring & Apnea Detection
Fitness Performance Tracking

product_details.description: ¹Galaxy AI features track data and require compatible Samsung Galaxy phone, Samsung Health app and Samsung Account. ²Available for outdoor running and cycling only. Must follow the same starting point and path as a workout selected from up to 14 days prior. ³The heart rate software functions are not intended for medical use. ⁴Requires compatible smartphone. ⁵Must wear device for 7 nights during a 30 night period. ⁶The Sleep Apnea Feature is an over-the-counter (OTC) software-only, mobile medical application operating on a compatible Samsung Galaxy Watch and phone. This feature is intended to detect signs of moderate to severe obstructive sleep apnea in the form of significant breathing disruptions in adult users 22 years and older, over a two-night monitoring period. It is intended for on-demand use. This feature is not intended for users who have previously been diagnosed with sleep apnea. Users should not use this feature to replace traditional methods of diagnosis and treatment by a qualified clinician. The data provided by this device is also not intended to assist clinicians in diagnosing sleep disorders. ⁷Tracks data and requires compatible Samsung Galaxy phone, and Samsung Account. ⁸Select interchangeable watch bands sold separately. ⁹Requires compatible smartphone. PUSH PAST YESTERDAY: Looking for a great way to bring out your personal best every day? Challenge yourself to excel on your next run or bike ride using tracking with Galaxy AI¹ that lets you compare your current performance to your last one² START YOUR DAY WITH YOUR ENERGY SCORE: Know how ready you are to take on the day using your personalized Energy Score with Galaxy AI¹; It calculates today’s physical readiness based on what you did yesterday KEEP A CLOSER EYE ON YOUR HEART HEALTH: Get the most out of your fitness workouts using improved Heart Rate Tracking³ with Galaxy AI¹ that filters out your body’s movements for a more accurate reading GET A BOOST TOWARD YOUR GOALS: Stay on track toward your goals using personalized suggestions from Wellness Tips⁴; Your Watch collects the insights and then they’re analyzed on your phone BETTER SLEEP. A HEALTHIER YOU: Learn better habits for more restful nights using sleep tracking⁵ with Galaxy AI¹ — it also helps detect moderate to severe sleep apnea⁶; Get helpful insights collected by your Watch and analyzed by your phone

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern tech-inspired advertisement for a smartwatch. The background uses a deep green gradient, enhanced with soft, radial accents and translucent, abstract shapes for depth. The top-left features large, futuristic typography for the main title ("heading"), followed by a bright lime-green subtitle ("subheading") that pops against the dark background. Below that, a block of informative white text ("description") highlights the product's features. A bold white price tag ("price") appears toward the bottom left, and next to it is a bright lime call-to-action button ("cta_button_bg") with dark text ("cta"). A high-resolution product image ("product_image") sits prominently to the right, tilted slightly, drawing attention and balancing the composition.

**Color Palette:**
- Forest Green #3C4B38
- Sage Green #51634D
- Bright Lime #C7E025
- Muted Lime #9BC01C
- White #FFFFFF
- Charcoal #333333
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek smartwatch with a modern, rugged aesthetic dominated by earthy and tech-inspired hues. The primary color is an army green strap (#59604A), which blends well with the gunmetal gray casing (#7C7C77). The screen exhibits high-contrast neon accents, particularly lime yellow-green (#D1EF00) and bright white (#FFFFFF) for the clock hands, giving a futuristic touch. A deep black face (#0E0F0F) anchors the visuals. Orange (#FF7B1C) and sky blue (#4CAFE6) stitch accents add subtle vibrancy. The blend of muted greens and grays with energetic neon tones makes for a dynamic yet premium palette for an advertisement banner.
